string.text: The {ClanName} have broken from {Kingdom} to found the {RebelKingdom}.
{FIRST_NAME}, I have heard you are in search of a new sovereign...
The {Kingdom} has been destroyed and the {ClanName} are in search of a new sovereign.
The {Kingdom} has been destroyed and the stories about it will be lost in time.
The {Kingdom} has joined to the {Ally} to fight against common enemy the {Enemy}.
